page.title: 11Games Children Play-contd
page.content:
{TEN NINE}is played by ages 7-11. One person is ON and the rest run around. When that person TIGS one of the others, they join hands and run to 'tig' others who in turn join the chain. When everyone is 'tigged' the game ends.
{RABBITS & BURROWS}is played by ages 8-11. One person is the HARE and another the FOX. The rest spread out around the playground and stand still. The fox chases after the hare and the hare runs to one of the others and says "Budge". The person who is 'budged' becomes the hare. If the fox 'tigs' the hare then they exchange roles i.e. the fox becomes the hare and vice-versa.
